name: VOML

description: Baby meal for infant aged at more than 6 months old.

description: Child meal for children aged 2 years and older.

description: Fruit platter meal prepared with fresh fruits or dried fruits.

name: HNML
description: Hindu meal containing lamb, fish or other meats. No beef, no veal and no pork. Non-Vegetarian

description: Indian vegetarian meal

name: LCML
description: Low calorie diet meal

description: Low salt meal with minimum sodium content.

name: NLML
